sentences.en: And for those who prefer a healthier diet there is also a hydroponic greenhouse where fresh vegetables will grow all year round.
sentences.cn: 还为那些注意健康饮食者建造了温室，温室内熟菜用溶液培养，新鲜绿色食品一年四季络绎不绝。

sentences.en: In recent years hydroponic farming has been expanded to many parts of the world.
sentences.cn: 近几年来,水栽法种树植已在世界许多地区推广.

sentences.en: Nickel ( Ni ) absorption and accumulation in tea plants were studied by hydroponic and pot experiments.
sentences.cn: 通过盆栽和水培试验,研究了镍元素在茶树中的分布规律及吸收累积特性.

sentences.en: People who practice hydroponic gardening as well as soil gardening understand this theory very well.
sentences.cn: 室内园艺非常受欢迎,尤其是在如此恶劣的气候条件下生长的食品或在土地贫瘠或不可用.

sentences.en: Please describe the characteristics of hydroponic and front views of marketing.
sentences.cn: 试论述水培花卉的特点?你对其市场前景有何看法?

words.tran_cn: 水栽培，水耕法；[植] 溶液培养学
